channel.title: Comments on: 2013 – Review of Writing
channel.description: A Technical Community for IT Professionals

item.title: By: Tahir Khalid
item.dc:creator: Tahir Khalid
item.description: Great post Ted, I am also a firm believer in cloud technology and I firmly believe developers of the future will be interacting with resources that will necessarily be local to them (and the same for the end user).
item.content:encoded: Great post Ted, I am also a firm believer in cloud technology and I firmly believe developers of the future will be interacting with resources that will necessarily be local to them (and the same for the end user).
